dialog.accessibilityMessage: Vox needs Accessibility permission to use keyboard shortcuts
dialog.accessibilityDetail:
Vox uses global keyboard shortcuts (like Alt+Space) to activate voice recording.

To enable this feature:

1. Click "Open System Settings" below
2. Find and enable "Electron" or "Vox" in the Accessibility list
3. Restart Vox

Without this permission, you can still use Vox from the menu bar, but keyboard shortcuts won't work.
